text: Hi, I am using VSCode with the Julia plugin, but when I am troubleshooting, I sometimes crash the Julia terminal which deletes the error messages. Does anyone know a workaround? It's difficult to fix a problem without any indication of where it lies.

elements.text: Hi, I am using VSCode with the Julia plugin, but when I am troubleshooting, I sometimes crash the Julia terminal which deletes the error messages. Does anyone know a workaround? It's difficult to fix a problem without any indication of where it lies.

text: To clarify, I know where the issue is in my code, but I haven't been able to pinpoint _what_ is going wrong.

elements.text: To clarify, I know where the issue is in my code, but I haven't been able to pinpoint

text: Maybe run in a terminal REPL instead until you have fixed the bugs that crashes Julia?
